pages.text: $(li)Candles are a new light source block.$(br)$(li)The fire of them can be extingued if water hits on the flame and they can be fired on with a Flint and Steel.$(br)$(li)They can be dyed placing a Candle and the specific Dye in a Crafting Table.
$(li)They can be used to craft $(l:patchouli:tools/buzzier_bees/scented_candle)Scented Candles$(/l).$(br2)Insert a picture of a Candle and dyed Candles
$(li)Soul Candles are a new variant of the Candles.$(br)$(li)Unlike Candles, Soul Candles procudes blue flames like the color flames produced if you use a Flint and Steel on a Soulsand block.
